title: Pixel 4 xl green tint/hue below 30% screen brightness
content: At Max brightness screen performs great. Once screen brightness slider is selected manually or automatically to reduce screen brightness below 30% screen beings to transition to a green tint that begins to get more pronounce the dimmer the screen. Which hurts the hell out of my eyes and leave the screen unusable until brightness in increased.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
